original_text: You can be sure about this. The master of a house does not know at what time of night a man would come to rob him. If he knew the time, he would watch his house more carefully. He would not let the robber come into his house and take away his things.
korean_text: 너희도 아는 바니 만일 집 주인이 도둑이 어느 시각에 올 줄을 알았더라면 깨어 있어 그 집을 뚫지 못하게 하였으리라

sentences.original_text: You can be sure about this.
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 이것에 대해 확신할 수 있다.

sentences.original_text: The master of a house does not know
a man would come to rob him.
he would watch his house more carefully.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신의 집을 더 주의 깊게 지켜보았을 것이다.

sentences.original_text: He would not let the robber come
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 도둑이 오는 것을 허용하지 않았을 것이다
